ygData.subject: Re: Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi again. I love the idea of the Mystic Alliance.  Unfortunately...I am one of those people who plays just one character.  On top of that I m an officer in
ygData.messageBody:
Hi again.

I love the idea of the Mystic Alliance. Unfortunately...I am one of those
people who plays just one character. On top of that I'm an officer in Light
of Norrath on the Karana server. As such I don't see myself bailing out of
the guild I'm in right at the moment. I've only bumped into a couple of gay
folks on Karana...and those I know in RL.

If enough people get together and want to form the guild on Karana..let me
know. I'd be willing to switch at that time.

Korwin Delamber (currently 22nd lvl magician)

a.k.a Rich
